item.description: Privacy Policy hyoromo built the Sound Game Training app as a Free app. This SERVICE is provided by hyoromo at no cost and is intended for use as is. This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service. If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy.

item.title: Character Introduction
